TopicTitle: Taking a Falcon 9 boosted SLS out for a spin to the Moon in RSS/RO

Articles.Content:
On the surface of it the first stage of the full thrust Falcon 9 seems like it makes for a pretty awesome SLS booster with 4 of them in positioned similar to the Zenith boosters on Energia. In fact the whole system is very similar to Energia with 4 kerolox boosters and a big hydrolox core. So I decided to see if I could use it to perform an Apollo like mission to the surface of the Moon.

Edited October 12, 2015 by maccollo
